input.sentences: a great big statue in the middle of the street .
the same statue with pretty lights on it .
a beautiful ferris wheel with lights on it .
the iffel tower with a light on the top of it .
a beautiful way to end a trip .
output.sentences: The tour began on a historic street which was known for the statue erected in its middle.
The statue was very pretty and accentuated by many lights.
The next stop on the tour was a large wheel adorned with lights and is known for being one of the world's most extravagant Ferris wheels.
The final stop was the Eiffel Tower, and an elevator ride to the top allowed views of the magnificent light display.
All in all, this trip was simply beautiful.
